title: 权限组继承不了
author: 仲夏大陆
txt_content: vip组继承不了，提示：Group vip1 already inherits Builder [might not be directly]

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddv vip build true
或者打开gm
打开worlds
打开world
找到group
找到vip租下面的build，设置为true
然后/manload

replies.author: 仲夏大陆
replies.txt_content:
qq1812538626 发表于 2016-9-12 10:40
/mangaddv vip build true
或者打开gm
打开worlds
虽然我百度弄好了但是还是感谢
